#### Tender Description and Objective

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Defense Research and Development Canada (DRDC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to support the development of laser sources and systems compatible with directed energy applications. The selected contractor will work with Defense Research and Development Canada (DRDC) – Valcartier Research Center (VRC) to improve their research capability in this area.
